original_text: Jehoiachin no longer had to wear the clothes of a prisoner. Every day for the rest of his life, he ate a meal at the king's table in Babylon.
korean_text: 그 죄수의 의복을 갈아 입혔고 그의 평생 동안 항상 왕의 앞에서 먹게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: Jehoiachin no longer had to wear
sentences.korean_translation: 여호야긴은 더 이상 입을 필요가 없었다

sentences.original_text: Every day for the rest of his life
he ate a meal at the king's table
